verses.name: 1 Corinthians 8:5
verses.text: For though there be that are called gods, whether in heaven or in earth, (as there be gods many, and lords many,)

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 8:6
verses.text: But to us there is but one God, the Father, of whom are all things, and we in him; and one Lord Jesus Christ, by whom are all things, and we by him.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 8:7
verses.text: Howbeit there is not in every man that knowledge: for some with conscience of the idol unto this hour eat it as a thing offered unto an idol; and their conscience being weak is defiled.
